attributes.action: bring about legislation to enable united kingdom citizens to divorce the united kingdom and its  government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition calls for the government of the united kingdom to introduce legislation, that wil enable united kingdom citizens to divorce then leave the united kingdom. this petition also calls for financial compensation to be paid to the divorcing citizen to compensate the citizen for the loss of any benefits that they may have enjoyed had they remained within the united kingdom as citizens of the united kingdom. this legislation would allow even the poorest people to leave the united kingdom on a permanent basis.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
